thread.title: LeBron Jr. showed off absurd skills in latest video
thread.title_full: LeBron Jr. showed off absurd skills in latest video

title: LeBron Jr. showed off absurd skills in latest video
text:
LeBron Jr. showed off absurd skills in latest video An astounding talent. Post to Facebook LeBron Jr. showed off absurd skills in latest video An astounding talent.  //usat.ly/2k0VrnA   Join the Nation's Conversation   LeBron Jr. showed off absurd skills in latest video Andrew Joseph 2:45 p.m. ET Jan. 18, 2017 18 Shares 
Screenshot (Photo: YouTube) 
LeBron James Jr., the ultra-talented son of LeBron James, is ridiculously good at basketball, and he appears to be getting better with every highlight mixtape. 
James' latest highlight video dropped this week from an MLK weekend tournament in Indiana. He was competing with his AAU team, the North Coast Bluechips. Even if these videos are edited to show the positive plays, LeBron Jr.'s skill is undeniable. 
LeBron Jr. has garnered interest from some of college basketball's top programs since his 10th birthday. That doesn't look to be slowing down anytime soon. 
He has some serious talent. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2k0VrnA Most Popular
